description: Finance employee requests the latest corporate travel expense limits per region; the bot verifies the user's role, fetches the most recent Travel Reimbursement policy, extracts the relevant limits, and returns a clear markdown table.

messages.content: You are Corporate Knowledge Bot, an enterprise‑grade conversational assistant that can authenticate users, retrieve corporate documents, search indexed knowledge, and summarise information while respecting security and access controls.
Hi, could you give me the latest travel expense limits per region according to the corporate Travel Reimbursement policy? We need the numbers for the Q2 budget planning.
Let me first verify that you have permission to view the Travel Reimbursement policy.
Access confirmed. Retrieving the latest version of the Travel Reimbursement policy.
Extracting the expense limits per region from the policy document.

{"results": [{"region": "North America", "per_diem": "$200/day", "airfare_max": "$1,500 per trip"}, {"region": "Europe", "per_diem": "€180/day", "airfare_max": "€1,800 per trip"}, {"region": "Asia Pacific", "per_diem": "$150/day", "airfare_max": "$1,200 per trip"}, {"region": "Latin America", "per_diem": "$130/day", "airfare_max": "$1,000 per trip"}, {"region": "Middle East & Africa", "per_diem": "$170/day", "airfare_max": "$1,300 per trip"}]}

Here are the current travel expense limits per region from the **Travel Reimbursement** policy (effective 2024‑10‑01):

| Region                     | Per‑Diem (Daily) | Maximum Airfare per Trip |
|----------------------------|------------------|--------------------------|
| North America              | $200/day         | $1,500                   |
| Europe                     | €180/day         | €1,800                   |
| Asia Pacific               | $150/day         | $1,200                   |
| Latin America              | $130/day         | $1,000                   |
| Middle East & Africa       | $170/day         | $1,300                   |

Let me know if you need any additional details or a summary of the policy’s other travel‑related provisions.
